sentences.en: Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.en: Ask your father to help you.
sentences.cn: 叫你父亲帮你。

sentences.en: Danny returned to Father's house in a state of intense agitation.
sentences.cn: 丹尼回到神父的房子时显得极为焦虑不安。

sentences.en: Father Stephen Lea administered the last rites to the dead men.
sentences.cn: 史蒂芬·利神父为死者主持了临终圣礼。

sentences.en: Father Whittaker appeared to be in a jovial mood.
sentences.cn: 惠特克神父看起来心情非常好。

sentences.en: Father's flat in Paris wasn't nearly as grand as this.
sentences.cn: 爸爸在法国的公寓远不如这处宽敞。

sentences.en: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

sentences.en: He had been deeply affected by the sudden death of his father-in-law.
sentences.cn: 岳父的猝死使他十分伤心。

sentences.en: He was their adviser, confidant and father confessor.
sentences.cn: 他是他们的顾问、密友和倾听者。

sentences.en: He’s been like a father to me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，他就像父亲一样。

sentences.en: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.cn: 他的长子约瑟夫继承了乃父的传统。

sentences.en: His father took him on a sentimental pilgrimage to Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸带他踏上了去爱尔兰的情感之旅。

sentences.en: I have sinned, Father.
sentences.cn: 我有罪，神父。

sentences.en: I would like your advice on a matter of conscience, Father.
sentences.cn: 我想就一件有关良心的事征求您的建议，神父。

sentences.en: Mike can take off his father to perfection.
sentences.cn: 迈克模仿爸爸时惟妙惟肖。

sentences.en: My father would go nuts if he saw bruises on me.
sentences.cn: 如果我爸爸看到我脸上有伤痕，他会气疯的。

sentences.en: My father would occasionally go to his Masonic lodge.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸偶尔会到他的共济会分会那里去。

sentences.en: Philip paced the floor, a typically nervous expectant father.
sentences.cn: 菲利普在地板上踱来踱去，一副典型的神经紧张的准爸爸形象。

sentences.en: She wanted to make a clean break from her mother and father.
sentences.cn: 她想和父母一刀两断。

sentences.en: Steve recently became the proud father of a 7lb 12oz baby girl.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫最近自豪地当上了爸爸，有了一个7磅12盎司的女儿。

sentences.en: Today he's still revered as the father of the nation.
sentences.cn: 现在，他仍被尊为国父。

words.tran_cn: 父亲的身分；父权；父性；父道
父亲的慈爱；父亲的风度

phrases.tran_cn: 父与女（动画短片，曾获奥斯卡最佳动画短片奖）
基督教圣父（指上帝）；天主教徒对罗马教皇的尊称

trans.tran_cn: 父亲，祖先，先驱，神父，上帝

trans.tran_en: to become the father of a child by making a woman  pregnant
